mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(meeting_room_id) FROM meeting_room WHERE name LIKE '%${searchContent}%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meeting_room(manager_id, name, seats, availability) VALUES (#{managerId},#{name},#{seats},#{availability})
mapper.update: UPDATE meeting_room SET manager_id = #{managerId}, name = #{name}, seats = #{seats}, availability = #{availability} WHERE meeting_room_id = #{meetingRoomId}
